BabyPaper

Our Story

When Baby Paper creator, Sari Wiaz's, children were young, she would hand them paper napkins to entertain them in restaurants. There was something appealing about the sensory stimulation in those napkins that mesmerized the kids, keeping them entertained. Many napkins later, the idea for Baby Paper was born....Creating a sustainable version of the paper napkin, with no chance of paper cuts and great for teething.


Our Products

Small enough for babies to grasp, the sensory CRUNCH of Baby Paper delights, calms and is safe for teething. Baby Paper is a perfect first toy for sensory development. All of our products are washable! Hand or machine wash in warm water with like colors. Tumble dry low or air dry! Our products are full safety tested and comply with CPSIA requirements
